page.title: 17Housing
page.content: In our block are many ages sizes and styles of houses .In the centre of town there are many old houses and mansions.When we go further out of town the houses go newer and newer.One of the oldest houses is Oak Hill Mansion which was built in abouit 1826.Some of the houses in the centre of town are about 170 years old.Some of the most modern houses are in Baxenden.Baxenden iabout 1 mile South of town centre. Plantation Street was once known as Arden Terrace.Plantation Street was built in 1889.Most of the oldest houses are also on Manchester Road.On Manchester road there are little cottages made of sand-stone.
